entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
